sys_security_acl.description: Allow write for all fields in x_560219_se_submission, for users with roles (x_560219_se.se_user, x_560219_se.se_admin), and if the ACL script returns true.
sys_security_acl.name: x_560219_se_submission.*

sys_update_version.name: sys_security_acl_ca4cac8cdb952c101738656b4b9619b1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow write for all fields in x_560219_se_submission, for users with roles (x_560219_se.se_user, x_560219_se.se_admin), and if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>x_560219_se_submission.*</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[//acl can be debugged by answer
answer = true;
if(current.se_submission_state == "4")//completed
	answer = false;
//submission in progress and role is user
if(current.se_submission_state != "0" && gs.hasRole('x_560219_se.se_user'))
	answer = false;]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-20 09:53:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>ca4cac8cdb952c101738656b4b9619b1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_560219_se_submission.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Skill Evaluation" source="x_560219_se">efb54d9bdb85a8101738656b4b9619c5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Skill Evaluation">efb54d9bdb85a8101738656b4b9619c5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_ca4cac8cdb952c101738656b4b9619b1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-20 10:44:44</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
